ai_analysis.summary: Missing signature detected. Mandatory rejection per strict signature validation policy.
reasoning: ML fraud detector identified missing signature
Per system policy: ALL money orders must have detectable signatures
This is enforced before all other fraud checks (including escalate_count)
Policy enforced to prevent fraud even if it may cause false positives
key_indicators: ML fraud detector flagged missing signature
ai_analysis.verification_notes: Document rejected due to missing signature. Manual review may be needed if signature exists but was not detected by OCR.
actionable_recommendations: Request customer to resubmit with clear signature
If signature exists on physical document, improve scan quality and resubmit
ai_analysis.training_insights: Missing signatures are high-risk indicators for fraudulent money orders
ai_analysis.historical_comparison: Consistent with strict signature validation policy
